content.detailedDescription:
Last night we were observing lunar eclipse from in front of our house. after all of the recent events in stephenville and after reading that the mexican air force observed ufos through their infra-red cameras, i decided to try the infra-red camera that my husband has in his work as an engineering test pilot. 

i pointed the camera toward the southwest sky. we live in burleson, close to joshua on acreage. there were intermittent clouds. 

at first we thought the bright, white lights were meteors.But meteors obey the laws of physics. 
we observed these lights, usually one or two at a time, zig-zag, some just stopped then changed direction,some made spiral movements and one moved in circles, some just seemed to zip through the sky upward or downward,like a game of ping pong.  my three daughters also observed this on the 8 in x 8 in. screen for the infra-red camera. soon it was too cloudy to see and it was about 10 p.M. we will try again another night when the clouds go away. my husband is going to connect the camera to a video-recorder and tripod. 

has anyone else seen the same thing using infra-red. it was compelling!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Dancing, stationary, zig-zagging white lights in southwest sky

content.detailedDescription:
My husband went out front. it was a very cloudy day.  he said to my two sons and me, "come out here and look at this stealth."  well i am not so sure if that is what it was.  it seemed so spherical and i've seen stealths in pics and they are not round.  so i ran into the house and snapped several pictures.  it was going so slow that i had time to go back in the house and change the batteries on my camera and then go in the back yard and take more pics.  we live very close to an airport (savannah, hilton head intl) and i see alot of planes and military jets.  we also live very close to two military bases.  it seemed as if was just floating along like a hot air balloon, but it was soooo high and black.  it just seemed very unusual.  i have pictures.  i will attach a few.  it was very high so i don't know if you can get much detail out of them.  one is interesting.  it seems blurred out. i don't know if that is just a trick of the lens of the camera or not though.  if you have questions or answers(!) do not hesitate to contact me.

sincerely,
nicole willett
912-660-1233
willett44@hotmail.Com

i have several more pics, if you send me an e-mail link i will forward all of them
content.summary: In front yard black sphere slooooowly crossing the sky took pictures

content.detailedDescription:
As i was watching the lunar eclipse from my back yard, i decided to try and record the event. i took photos of the moon with a digital camera but i thought i wouldn't even be able to see the moon in the photos.

i decided to try and record with my sony 990x video camera. the eclipse was very visible through the view finder. i placed my camera on a tripod and started recording.

i don't know the exact time as i don't wear a watch but it had to be around 10pm eastern time, give or take 20 minutes i saw what i thought at first was a falling star.

later as i plugged the video into my tv, i was stuned to see an object come from the top right corner to the bottom left corner with amazing speed and flashing white lights. check out the video and make your own decisions.

i feel sure others had to see this ufo also.
content.shape: Blimp,  Cigar,  Cross,  Flash,  Saturn-like,  Unknown
content.summary: Object  came from above right of the lunar  eclipse  to lower left with flashing lights

content.detailedDescription:
On fri.,july 12,2002 i was just completing my work as a truck driver at 
approximatley(0320).I completed my paper work and cleand up the vechile
before i locked up the truck. as i was walking into the building i ran into the driver for the baltimore truck. we were talking small talk about
work and fire business (me being a retired phila. fire fighter and jim
being a volunteer fire fighter in the area) when a small plane flying low
went past our company parking lot. i said he's pretty low, and jim said
ther was an incident on rt.422 just before he came to work(0300)that needed helicopter assistance, i told him that was not a helicopter and we
laughed about it. about 15 seconds later a bright light appeared over our
building and i said to jim,(where the hell is he landing) then it stopped
in midflight about 250' ft. away from us (as i said,it was a bright light,
but it did not omit light.)jim & i looked at it for about 15 seconds
(the object was hoovering along until it spoted jim & i).The objet stayed
ther for about 15 seconds as i said,then it moved towards the sky,not at
a missle type pace but as a controled asscent but very rapidly. it was
there and within 6 seconds was in the heavens. i don't know what the hell
it was but like i stated before i'm a retired phila. firefighter and a 
combat vietnam vet and when this thing flew away i said to jimmy,
"that's the damnest thing i ever seen in my life". i don't know what the
that object was,but i know ford,gmc,or chysler did not produce it.
content.summary: White light,app.5',silent,but did not emit light as in an flashlight

content.detailedDescription: Flying from el paso to dwf roughly 15 to 30 minutes after take off..Looking  down at the terrain towards  nm  i spotted 2 red, round objects{balls} 1 larger then the other, shoot past.  they seemed to be in a perfect straight line and stayed the same distance apart relative to each other. sometimes you see cables accross rivers with balls on them,  that was my first thought. but we had to be several thousand feet high by then, and there are no rivers there. the red balls flew past at a very high rate of speed, almost like when you see a shooting star. i noticed a lake below later[not sure how long after spotting balls], that i think is red bluff reservoir after looking at a map when i got home. so i guess that our flight path was close to a straight line from elpaso to slightly south of the reservoir. somewhere between i spotted the objects. cant explain....Ufo
content.summary: Spotted 2 red, round object from plane

content.detailedDescription: Flying from el paso to dwf roughly 15 to 30 minutes after take off..Looking  down at the terrain towards  nm  i spotted 2 red, round objects{balls} 1 larger then the other, shoot past.  they seemed to be in a perfect straight line and stayed the same distance apart relative to each other. sometimes you see cables accross rivers with balls on them,  that was my first thought. but we had to be several thousand feet high by then, and there are no rivers there. the red balls flew past at a very high rate of speed, almost like when you see a shooting star. i noticed a lake below later[not sure how long after spotting balls], that i think is red bluff reservoir after looking at a map when i got home. so i guess that our flight path was close to a straight line from elpaso to slightly south of the reservoir. somewhere between i spotted the objects. cant explain....Ufo
content.summary: Spotted 2 red, round object from plane

content.detailedDescription: Flying from el paso to dwf roughly 15 to 30 minutes after take off..Looking  down at the terrain towards  nm  i spotted 2 red, round objects{balls} 1 larger then the other, shoot past.  they seemed to be in a perfect straight line and stayed the same distance apart relative to each other. sometimes you see cables accross rivers with balls on them,  that was my first thought. but we had to be several thousand feet high by then, and there are no rivers there. the red balls flew past at a very high rate of speed, almost like when you see a shooting star. i noticed a lake below later[not sure how long after spotting balls], that i think is red bluff reservoir after looking at a map when i got home. so i guess that our flight path was close to a straight line from elpaso to slightly south of the reservoir. somewhere between i spotted the objects. cant explain....Ufo
content.summary: Spotted 2 red, round object from plane

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east on hwy 544 approaching the socastee area in south carolina, and i saw some lights in the sky.  they were about a 45 degree angle east from the moon and appeared to be going in a easternly direction. i looked at them and they were beige/tan in color.  i saw 3 sets of 2 lights all the same color.  they lights were laid out horizontal in the sky.  2 sets of lights were about level with each other in the sky, while one set was forward of the other 2, as if they were flying in formation.  each "object" had 2 lights on them and no other lights.  then the lights shut off...   for approximately 10 seconds.  i first thought with the color it might have been some thing like fireworks going off, but there was no explosion   then lights then came back on, on all 3 objects for about 5 seconds.  then the lights on the 2 objects on the left shut off again, while the 3rd object lights were still lit.  then the light on the left side of the object shut off, and then appeared on the right side of the object next to the other light.  that light then "slid" to the other side of the object, and went out and this same motion happened about 4 more times, then all lights went out, and i witnessed nothing else concerning this matter.  i then turned on the local news on the radio and listened to see if anyone else might have heard about it.
content.summary: Lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was in my study which is a conservatory. i stepped outside to have a cigarette. i happened to see a flash out of the corner of my eye. i looked up and saw approx 7-9 objects. they appeared to be hovering together. they then split up and went in different directions. the objects moved at variable speeds. the highest speed being very fast crossing from one side of where they were approx south-north in about 4 seconds. they seemed to disappear and reappear. i think this may have been very thin cloud at a high altitude. the day was clear and warm. i watched the objects do completely unatural manouvres. the object appeared to be metalic to white. it was a egg shape. i have seen a ufo when i was younger but nothing like this experience. i was intrigued and just blown away at to what i was witnessing. i tried to rationalize an explanation to being natural phenomonen but could not come up with any rational explanation. i do have a science backround and have been trained to be skeptical, but in this case i was just left scratching my head. my partner was at the supermarket and by the time he came home the objects were quite high and small. he did see them but they were distant dots in the sky. i ruled out seeing floating seed and insects as the flight was too steady. any slight wind would make seed or insects wobble. these objects did not do that. i ruled out seagulls because i could not see any wing movement and the speeds at which the objects travelled was too fast.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw a number of metalic objects at aprox. 3.25pm. there would have been 7-9.

content.detailedDescription:
For the past week i have been watching the jupiter web cams live.
almost ever night glowing space craft (disks) are seen swooping in low to the ground and moving up then back down and taking off at a high rate of speed to the north. these are not planes these are extraterrestrial craft.

there is no way to save the video but i have been recording them with my video camera aimed at my computer monitor and this works quite well.
the weather cam runs full streaming so it���s live.
amazing what we are seeing coming in from space.
mm from mufon has a great still shot of what i am saying taken in november of this year.
her website is www.Skyscan.Org

this goes with the reports of disks from the previous florida reports and i can cfm that disks have been in this area of jupiter and port st lucie.

folks get out your video and digital cameras tonight at 10:00pm a full lunar eclipse is happening and i'm sure many ufo���s will be around as well.

also the space shuttle landed today that what the double sonic boom was.
content.summary: Discs have been seen on jupiter webcams and sonic boom was space shuttle today

content.detailedDescription:
This is what i sent to weau:

 

yesterday, on tuesday the 27 (november) around 10 am, my daughter and i were driving just outside of chippewa falls.  

to the (what seemed to be) east we noticed a very large object high in the sky.  the object appeared to be coming down at an angle towards the north and moving away toward the east at the same time.  it looked like a ball of churning light colored smoke,  followed by a long smoke trail.     at the same time we were watching this we saw a smoke trail of a smaller dark object shaped like a ���cigar��� or ���rocket��� shoot up toward the first object, pass near it and continue upward arcing away east or north east.  this one had a smoke trail that seemed to split then join together.  we were on the freeway and so impressed with the size that i had to pull over and was surprised that no one else seemed to notice.  

also that it did not seem to have an impact to the ground.  i have a person that i referred to from madison who ruled out comets or asteroids. we tried to get pictures, but of course, camera failure.  there might be one on the camera phone.  was something having a landing problem, crashing?  

honestly, our feelings were of fear.  of what we weren't sure.  we just knew we were watching something unusual.

*we did get a picture on the phone but it seems faint and appears much farther away
content.summary: Huge ball of churning smoke coming down at an angle towards the north and moving away toward the east at the same time.

content.detailedDescription: We had recently lifted off on our flight from jackson hole wyoming back to pittsburgh via chicago.  we were off the ground for about 20-30 min (they were just getting ready to serve drinks).  i was looking out the window and then i turned my head to speak to my husband.  i only had my head turned for maybe 10 seconds and when i looked back about 1/2 way out i saw a moving object (moving in the oposite direction of our plane), i hit my husband and motioned for him to look with out taking my eyes off of it, and he saw it too.  we both initially thought it looked like a missile, but then realized there probably wouldn't be one so close to a plane.  it was white at the front and sort of glowing and had a short really thick black smoke that traveled with the object; the smoke was not hanging in the air behind it.  it moved straight across the sky.  we watched with our mouths hanging open for about 15 second and then the object disappeared.  not disappeared from our view, it just simply seemed to vanish.  i stood up and looked around the plane but it didn't seem that anyone else had been looking at the object.  we waited until we landed and let everyone else get off the plane so i could speak to the pilot.  he said he not seen the object.  i also can't believe that it wouldn't have shown up on radar.  the size of the object which i judged by another plane i saw in the sky at about the same distance away, was about 1/4 of a plane length.  i have been trying to research it on my own and have not been able to make any progress.  was it a meteor, or missile or something else?  it has been driving me crazy and i would love to have someone else���s perspective as to what it was.  thanks.
content.summary: White missle shaped object with very thick black smoke following it
content.locationName: Not sure in a plane, Wyoming

content.detailedDescription:
At 6:40 pm, on tuesday 2/19, 3 very bright golden circular lights where seen in the eastern sky in a triangle formation above longmont. the 3 lights slowly shifted into a diagonal line across the sky and sat stationary. they proceeded to shift into a horizontal line across the horizon and then slowly spread apart. for the next hour, the three lights seem to move in a large rotation across the sky but sat stationary for long periods. i placed high powered binoculars on one of the lights and it was a very bright golden color with a little red. the light i was observing was absolutely stationary in the middle of the sky close to the horizon. as the three lights where slowly rotating over a large area of the sky, one rose straight up in the sky with an enormous white beam below it. the beam was so large that it spanned a great deal of the sky as the light rose. the light rose up and gradually disappeared. the stationary lights also seem to be rotating in place-they glowed very bright at times. two of the lights remained stationary in the night sky along until 8:15pm when they were gone. 

at about 8:30pm, i observed a large oval shaped white light moving slowly across our window--a window at the apex of our vaulted ceiling it passed slowly moving west towards the mountains. we live at the corner of hover and hwy 66 in longmont, colorado.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large triangle/shifted into multiple formations and also stationary in sky for 2+ hours

content.detailedDescription:
Except for a few rainy days during the last two months i have personally witnessed two star like objedcts that at first hand looked like stars in the early dawn just before the sun breaks in. the objects seem to be in the atmosphere but by their position they're totally in a field by themselves and ever day as soon as i turn my head up to them, there they are! i even asked a newspaper vendor and she answered to me sayin that she always seen them. i explained to her that they could be ufo's and she acknowledge that to me. this is very unusual because their position is on the south east part of the tijuana rio malls. and from the united states side you can see them very clearly from a park near by.
i come to work and cross the border every day and this is what i encounter every day except for a few rainy days when there was cloud coverage.

latel i did not see the but i will check again tomorrow.I tried photo them but my camera a hewlett packard digital could not register them and the pictur is black.
content.summary: Twp diagonally  selected star like inmovable objects

content.detailedDescription:
A ufo keeps appearing every night for the last 5 nights  around the time of 8pm to 11 pm next to a field off becker road in port st. lucie. i did not see the incidents but rumors are going around by many towns people. it is hovering for quite a while almost nightly. it has become a rather big turn out at night. mind you this is second hand information. i did not see this first hand, but i am going to drive down to see this tonight. if true i will give you follow up details. 

also on another note at 9am on 2/20/2007 two sonic booms shook st. lucie county. no con trails  were detected but it was two loud bangs that sounded like someone jumped onto the roof of our house. all the neighbors are talking about it. it was heard all the way to vero beach florida.
content.summary: Hear say second hand info

content.detailedDescription:
As i have said, these objects can and will immitate anything and everything to get your attention.

someone contacted me and said "landing gear" and the "sun" gave this craft its extra, brilliant, orbs.  but the sun was almost three hours gone and this image was lifted from a video where the lights (right behind the cockpit) persist throughout. 

what do you think?

this image is untouched.
content.summary: Please identify

content.detailedDescription:
As i was watching disc 3 of the dvd set titled, "the sopranos, the complete fifth season" (home box office inc, 2004).  this was the episode titled "cold cuts."  the time code on my quick player reads 43:24-43:27 during this occurrence.  it was the scene right after christopher leaves the farmhouse in the morning.  he's driving back, feeling badly hurt that tony soprano and tony b. were picking on him during breakfast.  during the scene when he is driving back, i could see through the back seat window a distinct, red, disc shaped object apparently hovering a few hundred yards off (based on the trees that pass in front of it from the perspective from inside the vehicle and based on how slowly the object moves out of view due to the motion of the vehicle.)  this scene takes place in a wooded area and the object is no longer visible as the car continues forward.  christopher's head blocks the object from view after that.  then the scene cuts to directly in front of his face, and that's it.

when i first saw the object i couldn't believe my eyes because it looked exactly like other ufo's that i have seen on tv in the past.

i googled "sopranos ufo" and could find nothing on this.

if you can refer to this scene yourselves i would greatly appreciate if you could explain what it is.
content.summary: Disc-shaped object on season 5 of sopranos

content.detailedDescription: Im so tired of writing to tell what is going on.I waste my precious time to no benefit to me except punching in letters on this damn computer!Once again,go out to the outskirts of the northshore of lake ponchertrain and set up and look.These crafts are everywhere on a given clear night.The neocons know this, thats why they are chemtrailing every day that it is clear in our skies.They won now i am hereby giving up since noone gives a damn or cares what is going on in our world(skies).Later!!!!!!!!             p.S.-----scout craft flies around tree top level between 6:30 and 9:00. good luck!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
content.summary: Last time posting wake up neocon chemtrailspraying cannot conceil what is transpiring in the skies!Ufos galore all over!

content.detailedDescription: I was filming the moon on feb 18th.  i was pointed east and the ufo flew from the south to the north right into my viewfinder.  it was travelling very fast, so fast i did not have to time to react to try continuing tracking it on video.  i had no doubt it is an et craft from the first when i saw it fly by and then later looking at the video.  i was pretty amazed to see it although i have several others on video.  this one seems to be very large and disc or cylinder shaped.  it appears to fly behind the moon but i am not 100% percent sure about that.  i am about 11 miles from a dfw airport so this has to be close to their airspace.
content.summary: Ufo flew by the moon

content.detailedDescription: We checked the web cams on teton pass at about 11:30 p.M., february 18th.  the glory peak web cam showed an oval object in the upper right-hand corner of the picutre, probably visible because of the bright moonlight.  we printed the four picture set.  the object is visible in the picture, but not quite as obvious as it was on the web cam.  there were a couple of vehicles on the parking lot.  have you had any reports of -- or explanations for -- this object?
content.summary: Ufo over glory peak on teton pass, wyoming

content.detailedDescription: My cousin and i were driving down the highway and i was looking towards the inlet when i saw this very thin line in the horizon. at first glance i thought it was an airliner but i did a double take and noticed that it was wider than a plane, maybe 1 and a half 747s, no wings, so thin that it looked like it could cut the sky.  it was hovering in one spot just looking malicious and that is when i noticed the color of the craft. it was a very dark and... i want to say rich purple with a hint of a royal blue and the sun was reflecting off the top of the craft and at that point, amidst me trying to get my cousin to look at it and ignore the road, the thing darted about a half mile up and to the right of its original position and thats when i seriously believed that what i saw was in fact a ufo and that i need to make a report about it. at that point, the thing had just completely vanished.  i reported the incident to the ted stevens int airport which is relatively close to where i saw it and they recorded my report then transfered me to the faa who did the same and noone that i talked to seemed to doubt me which makes me think that they had gotten another report of it or that they already knew about it. one hell of a scary experience for me. i would appreciate if someone looked into this because up here in alaska, this sort of thing is unheard of.
content.summary: Saw a large, thin, dark purple disc hovering near airport for 15 sec then dart half mile away stayed still then disappear

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to work driving south and off in the distance to the southeast at about 10:00 i noticed a bright light, at first i thought it might be aircraft lights but they were really bright and it was not travelling as fast as aircraft do. after about a minute the light seemed to fade and i lost sight of it. i pulled into a gas station parking lot and scanned the sky to find it again, this time it was about 12:00 and travelling to the northeast and now there were two with one about a fist width in front of the one i originally saw. it seemed to be a blimp/cigar shape and i believe that its skin was reflecting the morning sun, which was why it seemed so bright and why it faded when it turned away. i could not judge the size or altitude.
the sky was clear with temps in the 40's, and no appreciable wind.
content.summary: An early morning sighting that i do not think was an airplane

content.detailedDescription: While flying into manchester england on the morning of 18 dec 2007, i awoke to a beautiful dawn.  so beautiful in fact, that i woke up the person next to me.  he grabbed his camera, and i grabbed mine.  we both spent the next 15 minutes snapping pictures of this fantastical scene.  it wasn't until i looked at the pictures on my pc that i found that what looked like a star or satellite to my naked eye was actually something quite different.  i thought that maybe i had jostled the camera while clicking it, but that would not explain the loopdy-loops!  anyone care to provide a reasonable explanation as to what this could possibly be?  all pictures are available for scrutiny at http://s252.Photobucket.Com/albums/hh28/wild-rumpus/.  the only thing i did to some of them was 90-degree rotation.
content.summary: Star over uk similar to stevenville texas movements

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bedroom, it had to be around 11pm. i was supposed to be in bed but was standing in front of my window. all i remember is the craft was literally hovering above my street, right in front of my house. it was very bright, thin and somewhat boomerang shaped. i can remember being so scared, i could not move an inch or take my eyes off of it. i had the feeling that the craft was just hovering there, watching me for what felt like forever but had to have been less than a minute. then, lightning fast, it took off and disappeared behind a palm tree located on the far right of me. by that time, i was breathing so hard and full on panicking. i ran straight to my parents room and woke them up. of course, they didn't believe me and told me that i was "just dreaming". that happened over ten years ago and i can still recall how i felt and what it looked like and that it went past the palm tree. it's something i will never forgot and never ever doubt.
content.summary: Riverside ca sighting

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife where driving through uath on hwy 95. i wanted to take some pics of the area. we where about 5 to 10 miles north of hanksville utah before the turn off for goblin state park.I dident notice the object the pic untill i got home. around may 20th 2007. i know i was faceing south when i took the pic. im not sure what i cought on film. but i cought something
content.summary: Round orange ball

content.detailedDescription:
First picture...March 2007, i was on a weekend vacation in las vegas.  woke up early in the morning  so i could take pictures from the hotel window of the sunrise.  i was not quiet happy with the quality of the pictures, so i never really looked at them.  they were taken through glass from the 17th floor of the hotel.  towards the end of the year (2007) i happened to go through the pictures and noticed something���.The lights in ���one��� of the pictures.  the reason i never looked at these was the quality of the pictures���1. i had to find a clean spot in the windows to take the picture. 2. had my lens flush against the glass (no flash or tripod used) 3.  they were slightly blurry.  i have tried to eliminate all possibilities of the lights, but cannot.

second picture...3/25/2006 - my husband was out taking pictures of the sunset, learning how to use his new camera.  although we live at the north end of the flight path and have birds flying over, he timed his pictures so neither would be in the frames.  he took 2 pictures back to back.  while going through the pictures, this one was almost discarded as a flop.  when i increased the size of the picture to see what these were, i can say that it isn't a plane or birds.  with closer examination, i noticed that the dash on the right is above the vapor trail.
content.summary: Amazing what you find in pictures after the event

content.detailedDescription: This evening while my son and i were outside burning trash, we saw 2 objects traveling at a fast rate of speed from a northwest to southeast direction. we were watching the embers in the smoke trail when we noticed the objects going overhead. we couldn't tell what it was, as with two of them following the same path, it was rather odd. the one in the front was not as bright as the one traveling in the rear. they went directly over our home and may have been a few miles high up in the sky. my 17 yr old son took out his camera phone and got a picture of the larger one. we lost track of them in the southern sky after that. we heard no plane engines(sounds) nor did we see any flashing lights.
content.summary: Saw two objects in sky, one following the other. traveling southeast and one in back was brighter.

content.detailedDescription:
When i arrived home i pulled into my driveway. my car was facing north. as i started to exit my car i was facing west to get out to unload my groceries when i saw a large white orb hovering next to a large evergreen tree in our neighbors yard. it was probably 150 feet from the ground. this orb was almost almond shaped. it was the size of 2 large beachballs. i as looked it just disappeared into thin air. i started to unload my car and just kept looking over to this area and saw nothing for about 5 minutes. as i came back out to my car in the driveway i again saw the same white orb in the same location  by the evergreen tree. i also saw a few feet away from this orb to what i can only describe as a solid metal ball that was pewter colored and it was as big as a baseball.It looked to be flying down to the ground with great speed followed by what looked to be a black/silver mist trail behind it. it was probably only 300 feet up in the air when i saw it coming at such a great speed. i just watched as both objects just disappeared into thin air.
about 15 minutes later as i went outside and saw the beautiful moon in the east sky. two very large amber lights were seen under the moon hovering low in the sky and iam not sure if those where planets. it was still not dark out yet and it just did not look normal because i didnt see any other type of stars or planets showing themselves yet.
content.summary: Large white orb hovering followed by a falling small orb with a black/silver mist trail.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down western avenue in the city of chicago heading south. it was around 2:15pm when i was stopped at a light at chicago avenue. there at the intersection a silver/grey metallic object caught my eye in the west sky over the buildings. it seemed stationary and large. i thought it must be a plane that caught my eye because it was sunny and it was just a reflection. before, i could get a better look, traffic started moving and i really didnt think anything was out of the ordinary.  when i got to grand avenue stopped at the light i again saw a silver/grey metallic object and it was shaped like a sphere and it was in the west sky just hovering. it was not a plane, a balloon or a helicopter. it had no lights, wings, windows, markings and it was not that high up. during this whole time regular commercial airliners/a traffic helicopter and birds where all seen too as any normal chicago sky looks. i thought wow!! then i figured it must be somewhere over the 290 expressway from my point of view. i kept watching and it did not move. traffic started flowing again and i did not see the object due to buildings and trying to pay attention in heavy traffic. when i got to the taylor street intersection i saw the same silver grey metallic sphere still hovering in the west sky. this metallic sphere at all times i saw it seemed like it was hovering just a couple blocks to the west of western avenue. i then past what seemed like i went under the object as i turned west on odgen avenue and did not see anything else of this object to either of my horizons or rear view mirror. i drove down odgen avenue to connect onto cicero avenue going south. while waiting to turn off odgen onto cicero i saw 1 white orb hovering over cicero avenue.  as i turned onto cicero, i still saw the white orb and it floated near a small puffy cloud and then just hovered under it. this orb was too very low in the sky with all kinds of air traffic and birds. as i drove past this area i lost sight of the object.
content.summary: Silver metallic to white orbs seen hovering in sky while driving home from work.
